thread.title: Abeiku Ainooson advises Local Black Stars poster boy Joel Fameyeh to REJECT big clubs Hearts and Kotoko
thread.title_full: Abeiku Ainooson advises Local Black Stars poster boy Joel Fameyeh to REJECT big clubs Hearts and Kotoko

title: Abeiku Ainooson advises Local Black Stars poster boy Joel Fameyeh to REJECT big clubs Hearts and Kotoko
text:
18:55 CET Abeiku Ainooson advises Local Black Stars poster boy Joel Fameyeh to REJECT big clubs Hearts and Kotoko - www.ghanasoccernet.com Joel Fameyeh 
Defender Abeiku Ainooson has advised hot-talent Joel Fameyeh to snub big clubs like Hearts of Oak and Asante Kotoko. 
The Kotoko ace fears the budding talent might struggle where the pressure is high. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us A person who is ill is called a patient just to remind the physician to be patient By: Fred Effah-Yeboah
